tool_description: A simple yet fast QR code generator. It simpy asks for text and it will convert to QR code.
name: Text to QRCODE
title: Text to QRCODE

api_list.name: text to qr
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://text-to-qrcode.p.rapidapi.com/qrcode-converter"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-to-qrcode.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://text-to-qrcode.p.rapidapi.com/qrcode-converter"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-to-qrcode.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
